sys_ux_client_script.name: Fetch my requests

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_eb788f5c99e2021046736e8f7c7157d2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">67788f5cd1e202107a22a1c6dcfdafe4</macroponent><name>Fetch my requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Completion date: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_myrequests.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        var currDate = new Date();
        var dueDate = new Date(model.model.due_date);
        const duedateLabel = [dueDate.getFullYear(), dueDate.getMonth() + 1, dueDate.getDate()].join('-');
        var price = model.model.price;
        if (model.model.table == "sc_req_item") {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
            if (model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
            if (price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null)
                model.subtitle = " ";
        } else {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
        }
    }
    api.setState('requestData', input);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>eb788f5c99e2021046736e8f7c7157d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch my requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_eb788f5c99e2021046736e8f7c7157d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
